RootTable.Filter: SELECT a.ea_guid AS CLASSGUID, 'Attribute' AS CLASSTYPE, p.name AS package_name, o.name AS classifier_name, a.name AS attribute_name, a.type AS type_name, a.classifier AS type_id, a.lowerbound, a.upperbound FROM ((t_attribute a INNER JOIN t_object o ON o.object_id = a.object_id) INNER JOIN t_package p ON p.package_id = o.package_id) WHERE o.package_id IN (#Branch#) AND a.upperbound NOT IN ('0', '1') ORDER BY p.name, o.name, a.name; #DB=COMMENT# Find all multivalued attributes, that is all attributes with a multiplicity with an upper bound greater than one. #DB=COMMENT#
